metadata.title: Glamfric - Book Beauty Services in 30 Seconds
metadata.description: Find and instantly book appointments at top-rated African beauty salons and professionals near you. Hair, nails, spa, and more. No calls, no waiting.
metadata.keywords: beauty salon, hair salon, nail salon, spa, African beauty, book appointment, beauty services, hair braiding, makeup, lash extensions

testimonials.title: Loved by customers &
testimonials.description: See what our community has to say about their experience

customer1.name: Sarah Johnson
customer1.content: Glamfric has made finding and supporting Black-owned salons so easy. I love the instant booking feature!

customer2.name: Michelle Williams
customer2.content: Since joining Glamfric, my bookings have increased by 40%. The platform is intuitive and my clients love it.

customer3.name: Angela Davis
customer3.content: Finally, a platform that celebrates and supports our community. The quality of services has been exceptional.
